Text: Hi Satan_Santa! i have nexus 1.1.0 something and a library of around 8 GB........my question is, if i install Nexus 2.2, will my 8 GB library gonna work in it. Plz clarify.......thanks.

To Install:

1. Open Nexus in fl studio

2. Click sys then click import data

3. find the .nxp file and click ok

4. Finnish ^_^
